questions.text: Systolic blood pressure 130mmHg or above (when blood pressure is correctly checked: unclothed arm, after sitting still for 5 minutes with the blood pressure cuff already on the arm, feet on the ground and back against the chair, without talking, or watching TV, and at least 30 minutes after exertion, cigarette or coffee).
